Al piano terra: sala da pranzo, cucina, soggiorno con camino (divano letto matrimoniale), bagno con doccia e WC, cantina. En la primera planta: 1 dormitorio (3 camas individuales), 2 dormitorios (1 cama doble y 1 cama individual).

de: Ehemaliges Pfarrhaus, das vollständig renoviert wurde. Kurort La Chaldette 10km. Im Erdgeschoss: Esszimmer, Küche, Wohnzimmer mit Kamin (Schlafsofa für 2 Personen), Badezimmer und WC, Keller. en: Old presbytery entirely renovated. Spa resort of La Chaldette 10km. Ground floor: dining room, kitchen, living room with fireplace (sofa bed for 2), shower room and WC, cellar. On the first floor: 1 bedroom (3 single beds), 2 bedrooms (1 double bed), bathroom, separate WC, dishwasher, fridge-freezer, microwave, washing machine, television, garden furniture, barbecue, central heating, terrace, grounds, parking. Sheets for hire.
it: Antico presbiterio interamente ristrutturato. Stazione termale di La Chaldette 10 km. Piano terra: sala da pranzo, cucina, soggiorno con camino (divano letto matrimoniale), bagno con doccia e WC, cantina.
